original_text: You teach that one day dead people will become alive again. On that day, whose wife will that woman be? She had married all seven of those brothers.’
korean_text: 그런즉 그들이 다 그를 취하였으니 부활 때에 일곱 중의 누구의 아내가 되리이까

sentences.original_text: dead people will become alive again
whose wife will that woman be?
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자는 누구의 아내가 될 것인가?

sentences.original_text: She had married all seven of those brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그 일곱 형제 모두와 결혼했었다
